SELECT s.`name` AS semester, c.`name` AS course, t.`name` AS teacher, c.`code` AS courseCode, t.jno AS jno, course_class.id, course_class.`no`, course_class.semester_id, course_class.course_id, course_class.teacher_id, course_class.start_week, course_class.end_week, course_class.`status`, course_class.create_time, course_class.update_time FROM course_class INNER JOIN semester AS s ON course_class.semester_id = s.id INNER JOIN course AS c ON course_class.course_id = c.id INNER JOIN teacher AS t ON course_class.teacher_id = t.id
and c.`name` like "%" #{course,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and t.`name`like "%" #{teacher,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and s.`name` like "%" #{semester,jdbcType=VARCHAR}"%"
and course_id = #{courseId}
